      readingID2 - second reading
      Returns:
      value for water consumption

      method inserts a bill to database and is used in billing()

      CustomerID - choose which customer to add bill to
      date - automatically uses the current day

    • insertMeterUsage

      public static void insertMeterUsage​(int meterID, int billID, int firstReading, int secondReading, String date)

      Parameters:
      meterID - Water Meter ID
      billID - Bill ID
      firstReading - First reading
      secondReading - Second reading
      date - the date of the consumption measurement
